Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 34th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2016...
Injured on 6/15/2017 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 10 weeks...
Injured on 4/10/2019 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 9/3/2019 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Traded from Kansas City to Cincinnati on 4/21/2020 (Going to KC: P Richard Thomas, P Thomas Tores, P Valerio Domenech. Going to CIN: C Benjamin Rosato, P Israel Cardenas)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 4/6/2022 (Going to CIN: 1B Estanis Aguilar, P Pablo Martinez, P Steven Cuyler. Going to BRO: P Samuel Valenzuela, 3B Benjamin Rosato, P Donald Newton)...
Injured on 8/9/2022 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/17/2023, off Ryan Boston (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/24/2024, off Orestes Morales (COL)...
Released by Brooklyn on 4/11/2025...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/16/2025 to a minor league deal...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $800,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/10/2026.
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 2/21/2026.
